mapper.select:
SELECT A.shinsakaiOrder AS shinsakaiOrder ,A.ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode AS ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode ,A.ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode AS ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode ,A.ninteiShinseiYMD AS ninteiShinseiYMD ,A.nijiHanteiYMD AS nijiHanteiYMD ,A.shoKisaiHokenshaNo AS shoKisaiHokenshaNo ,A.shichosonCode AS shichosonCode ,A.shichosonMeisho AS shichosonMeisho ,A.hihokenshaNo AS hihokenshaNo ,A.hihokenshaName AS hihokenshaName ,A.tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaCode AS tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaCode ,A.tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode AS tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode ,A.tb_nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode AS tb_nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode ,A.ichijiHanteiKekkaCode AS ichijiHanteiKekkaCode ,A.ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode AS ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode ,A.nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode AS nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode ,A.yokaigoJotaizoReiCode AS yokaigoJotaizoReiCode ,A.nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan ,A.nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD ,A.nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD ,A.nigoTokuteiShippeiCode AS nigoTokuteiShippeiCode ,A.shinsakaiIken AS shinsakaiIken ,A.gogitaiNo AS gogitaiNo FROM
ORDER BY shinsakaiOrder

mapper.sql: (SELECT dbT5502."shinsakaiOrder" AS shinsakaiOrder ,dbT7051."shichosonCode" AS shichosonCode ,dbT7051."shichosonMeisho" AS shichosonMeisho ,dbT5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS shoKisaiHokenshaNo ,dbT5101."hihokenshaName" AS hihokenshaName ,dbT5101."hihokenshaNo" AS hihokenshaNo ,dbT5101."seinengappiYMD" AS seinengappiYMD ,dbT5101."seibetsu" AS seibetsu ,dbT5101."ninteiShinseiYMD" AS ninteiShinseiYMD ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiYMD" AS nijiHanteiYMD ,dbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" AS hihokenshaKubunCode ,dbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" AS ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode ,dbT5101."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" AS ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode ,TB."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" AS tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaCode ,TB."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" AS tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode ,TB."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" AS tb_nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode ,dbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" AS ichijiHanteiKekkaCode ,dbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" AS ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" AS nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode ,dbT5102."yokaigoJotaizoReiCode" AS yokaigoJotaizoReiCode ,TB."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" AS tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD ,TB."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" AS tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD ,TB."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" AS tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan ,dbT5101."nigoTokuteiShippeiCode" AS nigoTokuteiShippeiCode ,dbT5102."shinsakaiIken" AS shinsakaiIken ,dbT5511."gogitaiNo" AS gogitaiNo ,dbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" AS shinsakaiKaisaiNo FROM rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS dbT5502 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5102 ON dbT5102."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS dbT5101 ON dbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" AND dbT5101."shoriJotaiKubun" IN #{code} AND dbT5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = False INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS dbT7051 ON dbT7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = dbT5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5116 ON dbT5116."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5511 ON dbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = dbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" ,dbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" ,dbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS dbT5502 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5121ShinseiRirekiJoho" AS dbT5121 ON dbT5121."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5116 ON dbT5116."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5121."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5102 ON dbT5102."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5121."zenkaiShinseishoKanriNo" WHERE dbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ) AS TB ON TB."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE dbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ) AS A
mapper.select:
SELECT A.shinsakaiOrder AS shinsakaiOrder ,A.shichosonCode AS shichosonCode ,A.shichosonMeisho AS shichosonMeisho ,A.shoKisaiHokenshaNo AS shoKisaiHokenshaNo ,A.hihokenshaName AS hihokenshaName ,A.hihokenshaNo AS hihokenshaNo ,A.seinengappiYMD AS seinengappiYMD ,A.seibetsu AS seibetsu ,A.ninteiShinseiYMD AS ninteiShinseiYMD ,A.nijiHanteiYMD AS nijiHanteiYMD ,A.hihokenshaKubunCode AS hihokenshaKubunCode ,A.ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode AS ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode ,A.ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode AS ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode ,A.tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaCode AS tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaCode ,A.tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode AS tb_ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode ,A.tb_nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode AS tb_nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode ,A.ichijiHanteiKekkaCode AS ichijiHanteiKekkaCode ,A.ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode AS ichijiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode ,A.nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode AS nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode ,A.yokaigoJotaizoReiCode AS yokaigoJotaizoReiCode ,A.tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD AS tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD ,A.tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD AS tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD ,A.tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan AS tb_nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan ,A.nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD ,A.nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD ,A.nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan AS nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan ,A.nigoTokuteiShippeiCode AS nigoTokuteiShippeiCode ,A.shinsakaiIken AS shinsakaiIken ,A.gogitaiNo AS gogitaiNo FROM
ORDER BY shinsakaiOrder

result.column: 審査会開催日
合議体番号

mapper.select: SELECT dbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AS 審査会開催日 ,dbT5511."gogitaiNo" AS 合議体番号 FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5511 WHERE dbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou}

SELECT DbT5594."shinsakaiIinShimei", DbT5594."shinsakaiIinShikakuCode", DbT5503."kaigoninteiShinsakaiGichoKubunCode" FROM rgdb."DbT5503ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho" DbT5503 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5594ShinsakaiIinJoho" DbT5594 ON DbT5503."shinsakaiIinCode" = DbT5594."shinsakaiIinCode" WHERE DbT5503."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ORDER BY DbT5503."kaigoninteiShinsakaiGichoKubunCode" DESC

SELECT DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" AS "shinsakaiKaisaiNo", MAX(DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD") AS "shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", MAX(DbT5511."shinsakaiKaishiTime") AS "shinsakaiKaishiTime", MAX(DbT5511."shinsakaiShuryoTime") AS "shinsakaiShuryoTime", MAX(DbT5592."shinsakaiKaisaiBashoName") AS "shinsakaiKaisaiBashoName", COUNT(0) AS hanteiYoteiSu FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" DbT5511 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" DbT5502 ON DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5592ShinsakaiKaisaiBashoJoho" DbT5592 ON DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiBashoCode" = DbT5592."shinsakaiKaisaiBashoCode" WHERE DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} GROUP BY DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo"

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" DbT5511 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" DbT5502 ON DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" WHERE DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} AND (DbT5502."hanteiKekkaCode" <> '01' AND DbT5502."hanteiKekkaCode" <> '11')

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" DbT5511 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" DbT5502 ON DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" WHERE DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} AND DbT5502."hanteiKekkaCode" = '11'

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" DbT5511 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" DbT5502 ON DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho" DbT5510 ON DbT5510."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" DbT5511 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" DbT5502 ON DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" DbT5102 ON DbT5102."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE DbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} AND DbT5102."shinsakaiIken" IS NOT NULL

DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '25' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "状変の一次判定要介護5数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN (DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '3') AND DbT5101."chosaKubun" = '1' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "状変の一次判定再調査数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の内2号被保険者数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5101."shisetsuNyushoFlag" = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の在宅数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5101."shisetsuNyushoFlag" = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の施設数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定非該当数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要支援1数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要支援2数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護1数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '22' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護2数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '23' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護3数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '24' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護4数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '25' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護5数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5101."chosaKubun" = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定再調査数", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '01' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定非該当数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '12' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要支援1数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '13' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要支援2数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '21' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護1数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '22' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護2数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '23' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護3数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '24' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護4数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" = '25' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定要介護5数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" = '2' AND DbT5101."chosaKubun" = '1' AND DbT5101."hihokenshaKubunCode" = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "更新申請の一次判定再調査数_2号被保険者", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '01' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_非該当", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要支援１", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '13' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要支援２", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '21' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要介護１", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '22' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要介護２", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '23' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要介護３", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '24' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要介護４", CASE WHEN DbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" = '25' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS "二次判定_要介護５" FROM rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" DbT5502 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" DbT5102 ON DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5102."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" DbT5101 ON DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" DbT5116 ON DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5116."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou}) TB GROUP BY TB."介護認定審査会開催番号"

result.column: 保険者名
保険者番号
申請日
被保険者番号
氏名
氏名カナ
生年月日
性別
二次判定結果
有効期間_月
有効開始年月日
有効終了年月日
開催番号
合議体番号
開催日

mapper.select: SELECT dbT7051."shichosonMeisho" AS 保険者名 ,dbT7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AS 保険者番号 ,dbT5101."ninteiShinseiYMD" AS 申請日 ,dbT5101."hihokenshaNo" AS 被保険者番号 ,dbT5101."hihokenshaName" AS 氏名 ,dbT5101."hihokenshaKana" AS 氏名カナ ,dbT5101."seinengappiYMD" AS 生年月日 ,dbT5101."seibetsu" AS 性別 ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" AS 二次判定結果 ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" || 'ヶ月' AS 有効期間_月 ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" AS 有効開始年月日 ,dbT5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" AS 有効終了年月日 ,dbT5102."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" AS 開催番号 ,dbT5511."gogitaiNo" AS 合議体番号 ,dbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" AS 開催日 FROM rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5102 INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS dbT5101 ON dbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = dbT5102."shinseishoKanriNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS dbT7051 ON dbT7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo"= dbT5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS dbT5511 ON dbT5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = dbT5102."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" WHERE dbT5102."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ORDER BY dbT7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,dbT5101."ninteiShinseiYMD"
